mobileAlert.title: Mobile Device Detected
mobileAlert.description: You appear to be using a mobile device. Please note that mobile styling may have some issues. For the best browsing experience, we recommend using a desktop PC.
mobileAlert.tabletDescription: You appear to be using a tablet device. While tablet experience is better than mobile, we still recommend using a desktop PC for the optimal trading experience.

browserAlert.title: Browser Compatibility Notice
browserAlert.description: Your browser may not support all features. For the best experience, please use the latest version of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge.

performanceAlert.title: Performance Notice
performanceAlert.description: Your device may experience slower performance. Consider using a more powerful device or closing other applications for better performance.
